short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Elevate web accessibility by changing the color of visited links. Improve web browsing experience with a better color contrast.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Recolor Links enables users with color deficiency to better navigate the web by allowing them to easily change the color of visited and unvisited links.

These users usually have a hard time distinguishing the default color schemes of links that appear on search engine results pages and popular websites like YouTube, Wikipedia, etc.

By changing the color contract of links, they are able to quickly identify which links are clicked and which are not â€“ which will be much friendlier.
